column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Wednesday September 25 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT - NEW CIRCLE RD AT RICHMOND RD:
column4: The exit ramp from the outer loop of New Circle Rd to Richmond Rd is shutdown until further notice.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT - NEW CIRCLE RD AT RICHMOND RD:
column4: Police are investigating an earlier serious collision reportedly involving a pedestrian.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT - NEW CIRCLE RD AT RICHMOND RD:
column4: UPDATE 9:49 a.m. - CLEAR.  The exit ramp is back open.
